analyzed: lhag ma lnga pa rdzogs so /
translated: The fifth pārājika is complete.

original: // / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs so //
analyzed: // / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed Buddha was staying at Rājagṛha.

original: nam dge slong ma mdza' mos tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la mi bden pas skur te dge slong ma rnams kyis bskrad pas //
analyzed: nam dge slong ma mdza' mos tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la mi bden pas skur te dge slong ma rnams kyis bskrad pas //
translated: When the nun friend falsely accused the venerable Cūḍapanthaka, the nuns expelled her.

original: der song nas rang gi khyim na gnas pa las nad kyis btab bo //
analyzed: der song nas rang gi khyim na gnas pa las nad kyis btab bo //
translated: She went to his house and lived there, but became ill.

original: de la nu mo dge slong ma grogs mi can zhes bya ba zhig yod do //
analyzed: de la nu mo dge slong ma grogs mi can zhes bya ba zhig yod do //
translated: She had a sister nun named Mitravati.

original: de 'chi ba'i 'khor de la phrad kyis myur du shog cig par spring ngo //
analyzed: de 'chi ba'i 'khor de la phrad kyis myur du shog cig par spring ngo //
translated: She sent a message to her: “Come quickly! I am dying.”

original: de yang song ste mdza' mo de'i nub mo dus las 'das so //
analyzed: de yang song ste mdza' mo de'i nub mo dus las 'das so //
translated: Mitravati went there, and that night her friend passed away.

original: grogs mo can yang de nyid du zhag lon na //
analyzed: grogs mo can yang de nyid du zhag lon na //
translated: Mitravati stayed there for the night.

original: mdza' mo'i khyim thab kyis mdza' bo zhig khyim du song ba de la des bus pa 'di dag sus bskyang bar bya zhes smras pa dang / nges grogs mo can de nyid la tshol cig dang / bus pa rnams skyong bar byed do zhes smras pas mos thos nas 'di snyam du bsams so //
analyzed: mdza' mo'i khyim thab kyis mdza' bo zhig khyim du song ba de la des bus pa 'di dag sus bskyang bar bya zhes smras pa dang / nges grogs mo can de nyid la tshol cig dang / bus pa rnams skyong bar byed do zhes smras pas mos thos nas 'di snyam du bsams so //
translated: The husband of the friend said to her, “Who will take care of these children?” She said, “Look for Mitravati herself. She will take care of the children.” When she heard that, she thought this:

original: gal te bdag gis tshig gi lan smras na ni tshangs par spyod pa las bral lo snyam nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go //
analyzed: gal te bdag gis tshig gi lan smras na ni tshangs par spyod pa las bral lo snyam nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go //
translated: If I answer him, I will break my vow of chastity.”🔽When morning came, her friend was about to leave. Her husband said, “Where are you going? Who will take care of these children?” He held her back.

original: nam langs nas grogs mo 'gro bar chas pa dang mdza' mo'i khyim thab gyis gar 'gro bus pa 'di dag sus bskyang zhes smras nas des de la bzung bar byas pa dang / grogs mo can gyis khyod bus pa dang bcas te me dong du lhung zhig smras te bros so //
analyzed: nam langs nas grogs mo 'gro bar chas pa dang mdza' mo'i khyim thab gyis gar 'gro bus pa 'di dag sus bskyang zhes smras nas des de la bzung bar byas pa dang / grogs mo can gyis khyod bus pa dang bcas te me dong du lhung zhig smras te bros so //
translated: Her friend said, “You and the children fall into a pit of fire!” and ran away.

original: dge slong ma dag gis khyod mtshan gcig tu gang du nyal zhes dris pa dang / de bzhin du smras so //
analyzed: dge slong ma dag gis khyod mtshan gcig tu gang du nyal zhes dris pa dang / de bzhin du smras so //
translated: The nuns asked her, “Where did you sleep last night?”🔽She told them what had happened.🔽“Who was your friend?”🔽“No one,” she said.

original: 'o na khyod kyi grogs su yin zhes smras pa dang / grogs mo can gyis gang yang med do zhes smras pa dang / dge slong ma dag gis khyod ni stobs dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig gis zin na tshangs bar spyod pa dang bral na ji ltar @54b bya zhes smras pa dang /
analyzed: 'o na khyod kyi grogs su yin zhes smras pa dang / grogs mo can gyis gang yang med do zhes smras pa dang / dge slong ma dag gis khyod ni stobs dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig gis zin na tshangs bar spyod pa dang bral na ji ltar @54b bya zhes smras pa dang /
translated: The nuns said, “If you had been seized by a strong man, you would have broken your vow of chastity. What would you have done?”

original: de ltar gyur pa snga ma bzhin du ston pa la gsol ba dang / nyan thos ma rnams la bslab pa'i tshig bcas so //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa snga ma bzhin du ston pa la gsol ba dang / nyan thos ma rnams la bslab pa'i tshig bcas so //
translated: As before, the Teacher was informed and the rule was laid down for the nuns.

original: yang dge slong ma gang gcig pu mtshan mo dbyar mo thad nas byung nas chos 'di yang thog ma nyid kyis ltung bar 'gyur la dbyung bar bya ste dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang gcig pu mtshan mo dbyar mo thad nas byung nas chos 'di yang thog ma nyid kyis ltung bar 'gyur la dbyung bar bya ste dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
translated: “If a nun spends the night outside the rainy season retreat alone, this nun too has a beginningless downfall; she is expelled and may not be fully ordained again.

original: yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni grogs mo can no //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni grogs mo can no //
translated: “If a nun” means if a nun who has a companion.

original: gcig pu zhes bya ba ni zla med pa'o //
analyzed: gcig pu zhes bya ba ni zla med pa'o //
translated: “Alone” means without a companion.

original: dbyar mo thang nas byung zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo gzhan du skya rengs kyis chod pa'o //
analyzed: dbyar mo thang nas byung zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo gzhan du skya rengs kyis chod pa'o //
translated: “Spends the night outside the rainy season retreat” means to spend the night outside the rainy season retreat when the sun has set.

original: gzhan ni gong du bshad pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni gong du bshad pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: The rest is as above.

original: de la nyes pa ji lta bu zhe na yang dge slong ma gang gcig pu dbyar mo thang gi phyi rol du skya rengs kyis non par byed na thams cad la 'ang dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la nyes pa ji lta bu zhe na yang dge slong ma gang gcig pu dbyar mo thang gi phyi rol du skya rengs kyis non par byed na thams cad la 'ang dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: What is the offense? If a nun spends the night outside the rainy season retreat alone when the sun has set, she commits an offense entailing suspension.

original: dge tshul ma dang lhan cig gzhan du skya rengs kyis non par byed na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge tshul ma dang lhan cig gzhan du skya rengs kyis non par byed na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro //
translated: If he does so with a novice nun, he commits a serious offense.

original: dge slong ma dang gzhan du skya rengs kyis non par byed na nyes byas kyi lhung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge slong ma dang gzhan du skya rengs kyis non par byed na nyes byas kyi lhung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If he does so with a fully ordained nun, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: gal te phyi bzhin 'ong ba'i dge slong ma des smras sam /🔽shi 'am / khrims ral lam /
analyzed: gal te phyi bzhin 'ong ba'i dge slong ma des smras sam / shi 'am / khrims ral lam /
translated: If the novice nun who is following behind him speaks up,🔽or if she is dead,

original: nyams sam / babs sam /
analyzed: nyams sam / babs sam /
translated: or if she has renounced the monastic code,🔽or if she has joined the faction of a different teacher,

original: pha rol gyi 'khor tam /
analyzed: pha rol gyi 'khor tam /
translated: or if she has gone over to an opposing faction,🔽or if she has become insane,🔽or if she has become mute,🔽or if she has become mute and insane,🔽or if she has become insane and mute,🔽or if she has become mute, insane, and deranged,

original: yul gzhan du bros par gyur pa dang / bar chad brgyad po las bar chad gang yang rung ste byung bar gyur na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: yul gzhan du bros par gyur pa dang / bar chad brgyad po las bar chad gang yang rung ste byung bar gyur na nyes pa med do //
translated: there is no offense.

original: lhag ma drug pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: lhag ma drug pa rdzogs so /
translated: The sixth part is finished.

original: // / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs so //
analyzed: // / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs so //
translated: The Buddha, the Blessed One, was staying in Śrāvastī.

original: de'i tshe na sbom dga' mos nyin par gcig pu song nas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim du chos bshad do //
analyzed: de'i tshe na sbom dga' mos nyin par gcig pu song nas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim du chos bshad do //
translated: At that time, Thullanandā went to the houses of brahmins and householders alone during the day to teach the Dharma.

original: de la dge slong ma dag gi si khyod gcig pu ma 'gro shig tshangs par spyad pa'i bar chad du gyur ta re zhes smras pa dang / sbom dga' mos ngas sbos 'tshang gi khye'u rdog pas bsnun te /
analyzed: de la dge slong ma dag gi si khyod gcig pu ma 'gro shig tshangs par spyad pa'i bar chad du gyur ta re zhes smras pa dang / sbom dga' mos ngas sbos 'tshang gi khye'u rdog pas bsnun te /
translated: The other nuns said to her, “You should not go alone. It will be an obstacle to your pure conduct.”🔽“Haven’t you seen me kick the perfumer’s son with my foot,🔽throw him on the ground, and make him vomit blood?”

original: gan ta log tu bor nas khrag skyugs su bcug pa ma mthong ngam zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis thams cad spos 'tshong gi khye'u mi 'dra'o zhes smras so //
analyzed: gan ta log tu bor nas khrag skyugs su bcug pa ma mthong ngam zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis thams cad spos 'tshong gi khye'u mi 'dra'o zhes smras so //
translated: “The perfumer’s son is not like that.”

original: de ltar gyur pa snga ma bzhin du ston pa la gsol nas bslab pa'i gnas bcas so //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa snga ma bzhin du ston pa la gsol nas bslab pa'i gnas bcas so //
translated: As before, they told the Teacher, who laid down the training rule.

original: yang dge slong ma gang gcig pu dbyar mo thang nas sod na chos 'di thog ma nyid kyis ltung par 'gyur la /🔽'byung bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang gcig pu dbyar mo thang nas sod na chos 'di thog ma nyid kyis ltung par 'gyur la / 'byung bar bya ste /
translated: “If a nun spends the rainy season alone, she commits an offense entailing confession for that action alone.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
translated: She should confess and undertake it again.🔽This is the proper conduct.

original: yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //
translated: ‘A nun’: Sthūlanandā.

original: @55a * // gcig pu nyin mo zhes bya ba ni zla med pa'o //
analyzed: @55a * // gcig pu nyin mo zhes bya ba ni zla med pa'o //
translated: Alone: without a companion.

original: dbyar mo thang nas song na zhes bya ba ni gzhan du nyi ma nub par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dbyar mo thang nas song na zhes bya ba ni gzhan du nyi ma nub par gyur pa'o //
translated: “If she goes from the rainy season retreat to another place where the sun sets” means that she goes to another place where the sun sets.

original: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: de la nyes pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de la nyes pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the offense?

original: dge slong mas ji tsam du dbyar mo thang nas gcig pu song la gzhan du nyi ma nub par gyur na thams cad la 'ang lhag mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge slong mas ji tsam du dbyar mo thang nas gcig pu song la gzhan du nyi ma nub par gyur na thams cad la 'ang lhag mar 'gyur ro //
translated: If a fully ordained nun goes from the rainy season retreat to another place where the sun sets alone, there is an offense of wrongdoing for each person.

original: dge tshul ma dang lhan cig dbyar mo thang nas song ste /
analyzed: dge tshul ma dang lhan cig dbyar mo thang nas song ste /
translated: If she goes from the rainy season retreat with a trainee nun,

original: gzhan du nyi ma nub na nyes pa sbom pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du nyi ma nub na nyes pa sbom pa'o //
translated: and the sun sets in another place, there is a serious offense.

original: dge slong ma dang lhan cig dbyar mo thang nas song ste /
analyzed: dge slong ma dang lhan cig dbyar mo thang nas song ste /
translated: If she goes from the rainy season retreat with a fully ordained nun,

original: gzhan du nyi ma nub na nyes byas so //🔽gal te khrims zla dmas sam shi ba 'am ;
analyzed: gzhan du nyi ma nub na nyes byas so // gal te khrims zla dmas sam shi ba 'am ;
translated: and the sun sets in another place, there is an offense of wrong conduct.🔽If the companion is suspended, has died,

original: babs sam / pha rol gyi 'khor tam /
analyzed: babs sam / pha rol gyi 'khor tam /
translated: has disrobed, has joined the faction of non-Buddhists,

original: yul gzhan du bros par gyur tam /
analyzed: yul gzhan du bros par gyur tam /
translated: has fled to another country,

original: bar chad brgyad las gang yang rung ba zhig byung na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: bar chad brgyad las gang yang rung ba zhig byung na nyes pa med do //
translated: or has encountered one of the eight impediments, there is no offense.

original: las dang po pa la sogs pa la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: las dang po pa la sogs pa la nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no offense for a beginner, and so on.

original: lhag ma bdun pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: lhag ma bdun pa rdzogs so /
translated: The seventh chapter is complete.

original: // / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs so //
analyzed: // / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed Buddha was staying at Śrāvastī.

original: sbom dga' mos rgyal po'i khab tu 'ong ba'i 'dron po mang po dang lhan cig tu chas te /
analyzed: sbom dga' mos rgyal po'i khab tu 'ong ba'i 'dron po mang po dang lhan cig tu chas te /
translated: Thīla sundarī set out with a large caravan going to Rājagṛha.

original: gcig pu grong khyer drug tu so sor 'dong ba'i 'dron po mang po dang lhan cig tu dang nas ngal chad de rim gyis slar dge slong ma'i dbyar mo thang du 'ongs so //
analyzed: gcig pu grong khyer drug tu so sor 'dong ba'i 'dron po mang po dang lhan cig tu dang nas ngal chad de rim gyis slar dge slong ma'i dbyar mo thang du 'ongs so //
translated: She went alone to the six great cities, and after resting, she gradually returned to the nuns’ rainy season retreat.

original: de nas dge slong ma dag la lus mnyer bcug cing ngal sos par byed do //
analyzed: de nas dge slong ma dag la lus mnyer bcug cing ngal sos par byed do //
translated: There the nuns massaged her body and helped her relax.🔽The nuns asked her, “Where have you been?”

original: dge slong ma dag gis khyed gang nas 'ongs zhes dris pa dang / bdag grong khyer chen po drug gi lam bgrod de 'dir 'ongs so //
analyzed: dge slong ma dag gis khyed gang nas 'ongs zhes dris pa dang / bdag grong khyer chen po drug gi lam bgrod de 'dir 'ongs so //
translated: “I have been traveling on the roads to the six great cities.”

original: dge slong ma dag gis smras pa khyod ni mthu dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig gis zin na tshangs par spyad pa'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: dge slong ma dag gis smras pa khyod ni mthu dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig gis zin na tshangs par spyad pa'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'am /
translated: The nuns said, “You are powerful. If you had been seized by someone, it would have been an obstacle to your celibate life.

original: sbom dga' mos smras pa /
analyzed: sbom dga' mos smras pa /
translated: Thīla sundarī said,🔽“

original: spos 'tshong gi khye'u khrag dron po skyugs pa ma thos sam zhes gong ma bzhin du smras pa dang / dge slong mas smras pa thams cad spos 'tshong gi khye'u 'dra bar 'gyur ram zhes byas pa dang / de ltar gyur pa ston pa la gsol nas bslab pa'i gnas bcas so //
analyzed: spos 'tshong gi khye'u khrag dron po skyugs pa ma thos sam zhes gong ma bzhin du smras pa dang / dge slong mas smras pa thams cad spos 'tshong gi khye'u 'dra bar 'gyur ram zhes byas pa dang / de ltar gyur pa ston pa la gsol nas bslab pa'i gnas bcas so //
translated: After that happened, they asked the Teacher and he established a rule.

original: yang dge slong ma gang gcig pu lam du zhugs shing 'gro na chos 'di la thog ma nyid kyis lhung bar 'gyur la 'byung bar byas te /
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang gcig pu lam du zhugs shing 'gro na chos 'di la thog ma nyid kyis lhung bar 'gyur la 'byung bar byas te /
translated: “If a nun travels alone on a road, she will fall from this Dharma from the very beginning.

original: dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o //
translated: It is a pārājika offense.

original: dge slong ma gcig pu zhes bya ba ni gong ma dang @55b 'dra'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma gcig pu zhes bya ba ni gong ma dang @55b 'dra'o //
translated: ‘Alone’ means as above.

original: lam zhes bya ba ni dgon pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: lam zhes bya ba ni dgon pa'i lam mo //
translated: ‘Road’ means a road in the wilderness.

original: gzhan ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as explained above.

original: de la nyes pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de la nyes pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the fault?

original: dge slong ma ji tsam du gcig pu lam du zhugs shing song na lhag mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge slong ma ji tsam du gcig pu lam du zhugs shing song na lhag mar 'gyur ro //
translated: A nun who travels alone on a road will be expelled.

original: dge tshul ma dang dge slong ma dang lhan cig lam du zhugs te song na nyes pa'i khyad bar ni gong ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dge tshul ma dang dge slong ma dang lhan cig lam du zhugs te song na nyes pa'i khyad bar ni gong ma bzhin no //
translated: The difference in the faults of traveling with a novice nun or a fully ordained nun is the same as above.

original: dge slong ma gcig pu grong khyer gyi bar du ni rgyang grags gcig las 'das na lhag ma dgon pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: dge slong ma gcig pu grong khyer gyi bar du ni rgyang grags gcig las 'das na lhag ma dgon pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: If a fully ordained nun goes to a village alone, she commits a serious transgression if she goes beyond the distance of one krosa. The rest is the same as above.

original: rgyang grags gcig tsam du phyin nas phyir ldog go snyam ste song ba las phyir ldog na sbom po'o //
analyzed: rgyang grags gcig tsam du phyin nas phyir ldog go snyam ste song ba las phyir ldog na sbom po'o //
translated: If she goes the distance of one krosa and then returns, thinking, “I will return,” she commits a serious transgression.

original: lhag ma brgyad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: lhag ma brgyad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The eighth part is complete.

original: // / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs so //
analyzed: // / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed Buddha was staying at Śrāvastī.

original: dge slong ma mang zhig ljongs rgyur dong ba las chu bo khyim ldan gyi 'gram du phyin pa dang gru pha rol du 'dug go //
analyzed: dge slong ma mang zhig ljongs rgyur dong ba las chu bo khyim ldan gyi 'gram du phyin pa dang gru pha rol du 'dug go //
translated: Many fully ordained nuns went to the countryside, and when they reached the bank of the Gaṅgā River, the boat was on the other side.

original: de nas dge slong mnag mo zhes bya ba sngon mnyan pa mo yin te /
analyzed: de nas dge slong mnag mo zhes bya ba sngon mnyan pa mo yin te /
translated: Then a fully ordained nun named Maṅkū, who had previously been a boatwoman,

original: des bdag gis pha rol du brgal nus kyis song la gru pha gi tshur khrid de 'ong ngo zhes smras te gru phyir rgyal ba dang ngal nas shi la thug ste /
analyzed: des bdag gis pha rol du brgal nus kyis song la gru pha gi tshur khrid de 'ong ngo zhes smras te gru phyir rgyal ba dang ngal nas shi la thug ste /
translated: She said, I can cross to the other side. Go ahead and take the boat across to the other side. She rowed the boat back and forth, and became exhausted.

original: dge slong ma dag gis nag mo ma 'jigs ma sdangs par skyol cig ces bos so //
analyzed: dge slong ma dag gis nag mo ma 'jigs ma sdangs par skyol cig ces bos so //
translated: The nuns called out, Kālī, don't be afraid! Don't be afraid! Take it across!

original: nag mo yang nyon mongs shing de'u ma brgal ba las pha rol gyi ngogs su phyin no //
analyzed: nag mo yang nyon mongs shing de'u ma brgal ba las pha rol gyi ngogs su phyin no //
translated: Kālī was exhausted, but she took the boat across to the other side.

original: de ltar gyur pa ston pa la gsol nas bslab pa'i gnas bcas so //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa ston pa la gsol nas bslab pa'i gnas bcas so //
translated: When the Teacher was informed of what had happened, he laid down a rule of training.

original: yang dge slong ma gang gcig phu klung gi pha rol du brgal na chos 'di yang thog ma nyid kyis ltung bar 'gyur la dbyung bar bya ba ste /🔽dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang gcig phu klung gi pha rol du brgal na chos 'di yang thog ma nyid kyis ltung bar 'gyur la dbyung bar bya ba ste / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o //
translated: If a nun crosses a river alone, this nun too has a root downfall and is expelled from the order.

original: yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni nag mo'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni nag mo'o //
translated: If a nun means if Kālī.

original: gcig pu zhes bya ba ni zla med pa'o ;
analyzed: gcig pu zhes bya ba ni zla med pa'o ;
translated: Alone means without a companion.

original: / klung gi pha rol brgal zhes bya ba ni rkyal ba'o //
analyzed: / klung gi pha rol brgal zhes bya ba ni rkyal ba'o //
translated: Crossing a river means by boat.

original: lhag ma zhes bya ba'i bar du ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma zhes bya ba'i bar du ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as above.

original: de la nyes pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de la nyes pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the offense?

original: dge slong ma gcig pu klung gi pha rol du brgal tam rkyal te brgal na lhag ma'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma gcig pu klung gi pha rol du brgal tam rkyal te brgal na lhag ma'o //
translated: If a bhikṣuṇī crosses a river alone, whether by swimming or by boat, it is an offense entailing suspension.

original: rtsang lag gi pha rol tu brgal na nyes byas so //🔽dge tshul dang lhan cig 'grogs na sbom po'o //
analyzed: rtsang lag gi pha rol tu brgal na nyes byas so // dge tshul dang lhan cig 'grogs na sbom po'o //
translated: If she crosses a river alone, but not to the other side, it is an offense of wrong conduct.🔽If she crosses a river with a novice monk, it is a serious offense.

original: dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'grogs na nyes byas so //
analyzed: dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'grogs na nyes byas so //
translated: If she crosses a river with a bhikṣuṇī, it is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: lhag ma dgu pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: lhag ma dgu pa rdzogs so /
translated: The ninth training rule on the group of nine is finished.

original: // / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs so //
analyzed: // / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed Buddha was staying at Śrāvastī.

original: de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi dmag dpon kanta shak ti ka zhes bya ba @56a * //
analyzed: de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi dmag dpon kanta shak ti ka zhes bya ba @56a * //
translated: At that time, the general of King Prasenajit was named Kaṇṭhaka.

original: dmag la 'dong ba'i 'og tu de dag gi chung ma skyes pa gzhan dag dang yongs su spyod do //
analyzed: dmag la 'dong ba'i 'og tu de dag gi chung ma skyes pa gzhan dag dang yongs su spyod do //
translated: After he went off to war, his wife had sex with other men.

original: de dag dmag las slar lhags nas thos pa dang de dag bcings nas lcag gis kyang gzhus so //
analyzed: de dag dmag las slar lhags nas thos pa dang de dag bcings nas lcag gis kyang gzhus so //
translated: When they returned from war, they heard about this and bound her and beat her with a whip.

original: de ltar byas kyang gtod du ma btub nas de dag gis bsams pa ri brags kyi grong rnams dbang du gyur na bdag cag gi chung ma dbang du ma khugs snyam nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du dong nas lha mkhyen par mdzod cig /
analyzed: de ltar byas kyang gtod du ma btub nas de dag gis bsams pa ri brags kyi grong rnams dbang du gyur na bdag cag gi chung ma dbang du ma khugs snyam nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du dong nas lha mkhyen par mdzod cig /
translated: When they did this, the women would not submit. They thought, If the towns of the mountain fortresses are brought under our control, then we will not be able to control our own wives. They went before King Prasenajit and said,

original: bdag gi bud med khrims las 'gal bar bgyid pas chad pas bcad pa'i khrims bcas so zhes gsol ba dang / rgyal pos kyang rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: bdag gi bud med khrims las 'gal bar bgyid pas chad pas bcad pa'i khrims bcas so zhes gsol ba dang / rgyal pos kyang rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: Your Majesty, please know that our women are breaking the law. Please make a law to punish them. The king agreed.

original: dus phyi zhig na dmag dpon me na zhes bya ba'i bu mo ni ka zhes bya ba de khrims dang 'gal te /
analyzed: dus phyi zhig na dmag dpon me na zhes bya ba'i bu mo ni ka zhes bya ba de khrims dang 'gal te /
translated: Later, the daughter of General Menaka, named Nika, broke the law.

original: de mang pos chad pa bcad /
analyzed: de mang pos chad pa bcad /
translated: She was punished by the people.

original: khyim thab kyis ni yongs su btang /
analyzed: khyim thab kyis ni yongs su btang /
translated: Her husband abandoned her.

original: rgyal pos ni bsgo ba dang / des mang po la gsol nas 'phral du mi gsad cing zhag bdun nas bsad par gnang ba dang / de yang du zhing 'dug ste /
analyzed: rgyal pos ni bsgo ba dang / des mang po la gsol nas 'phral du mi gsad cing zhag bdun nas bsad par gnang ba dang / de yang du zhing 'dug ste /
translated: The king ordered her to be executed, but she begged the people and was allowed to live for seven days before her execution.

original: spyin pa ni byin bsod nams ni byed do //
analyzed: spyin pa ni byin bsod nams ni byed do //
translated: She gave gifts and made merit.

original: sbom dga' mo bsod snyoms la song ste /🔽me ni ka'i khyim du phyin pa dang khyod ci'i phyir du zhes 'dris pa dang des kyang zhib tu smras so //
analyzed: sbom dga' mo bsod snyoms la song ste / me ni ka'i khyim du phyin pa dang khyod ci'i phyir du zhes 'dris pa dang des kyang zhib tu smras so //
translated: She went to the house of Menakā.🔽“Why are you crying?” asked Pūrṇa.🔽“Because I am not allowed to go forth,” she replied.

original: sbom dga' mos 'o na ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /
analyzed: sbom dga' mos 'o na ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /
translated: “Well then, why don’t you go forth?” asked Pūrṇa.🔽“Who will give me the going forth?”

original: des smras pa su zhig gis bdag rab tu 'byin sbom dga' mos rang rab tu dbyung ngo zhes smras nas /
analyzed: des smras pa su zhig gis bdag rab tu 'byin sbom dga' mos rang rab tu dbyung ngo zhes smras nas /
translated: “I will give you the going forth,” said Pūrṇa.🔽When Kaṇṭhakaśāṭaka heard that, he said, “I will not allow it. When seven days have passed, I will kill her.”🔽Pūrṇa heard this and took Menakā to Queen Mṛgī and asked her to allow Menakā to go forth.

original: de rab tu phyung ba dang / kanta shag ti kas thos nas de ltar mi gnang gis zhag bdun tshang ba dang bsad do zhes smras pa sbom dga' mos thos nas me ne ka khrid de btsun mo phreng ldan ma la gsol pa dang / des smras pa ci bud med zad dam de lta bu rab tu dbyung ba mi rigs mod kyi ngas rgyal po la gsol zhes byas nas de lta bur gyur pa rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol pa dang /
analyzed: de rab tu phyung ba dang / kanta shag ti kas thos nas de ltar mi gnang gis zhag bdun tshang ba dang bsad do zhes smras pa sbom dga' mos thos nas me ne ka khrid de btsun mo phreng ldan ma la gsol pa dang / des smras pa ci bud med zad dam de lta bu rab tu dbyung ba mi rigs mod kyi ngas rgyal po la gsol zhes byas nas de lta bur gyur pa rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol pa dang /
translated: “Is there no end of women going forth?” she asked. “It is not right to allow this. But I will ask the king.”

original: rgyal pos blon po la bsgo ba rab tu byung ba bsad na nga la mi snyan gyis ma bsad cig ces byas pa dang / kanta shag ti ka 'phya ste de lta bu ci'i phyir rab tu 'byin zhes mi snyan par 'dzer to //
analyzed: rgyal pos blon po la bsgo ba rab tu byung ba bsad na nga la mi snyan gyis ma bsad cig ces byas pa dang / kanta shag ti ka 'phya ste de lta bu ci'i phyir rab tu 'byin zhes mi snyan par 'dzer to //
translated: The king ordered his ministers, “Do not kill the one who has gone forth. If I hear that you have killed him, I will not be pleased.”

original: de ltar gyur pa ston pa la gsol nas bslab pa'i gnas bslab pa'i gnas bcas so //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa ston pa la gsol nas bslab pa'i gnas bslab pa'i gnas bcas so //
translated: When the Teacher was informed of this, he laid down a training rule.

original: yang dge slong ma gang gis bud med mang po mthun pas bcad cing khyim thab kyis yongs su btang la //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang gis bud med mang po mthun pas bcad cing khyim thab kyis yongs su btang la //
translated: “If a bhikṣuṇī gives the going forth to a woman who has been sentenced by a unanimous assembly of women and who has been abandoned by her husband,

original: rgyal pos kyang bsgo bar shes bzhin @56b du rab tu phyung na chos 'di yang thog ma nyid kyis ltung bar 'gyur la dbyung bar bya ba ste dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
analyzed: rgyal pos kyang bsgo bar shes bzhin @56b du rab tu phyung na chos 'di yang thog ma nyid kyis ltung bar 'gyur la dbyung bar bya ba ste dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
translated: and who has been ordered by the king not to be killed, this bhikṣuṇī too has committed a saṃghātiśeṣa offense entailing confession and forfeiture.

original: yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sngon dga' mo'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sngon dga' mo'o //
translated: ‘Bhikṣuṇī’ means as explained above.

original: bud med gang zhes bya ba ni me ne ka'o //
analyzed: bud med gang zhes bya ba ni me ne ka'o //
translated: ‘A woman’ means a woman who has been sentenced by a unanimous assembly of women and who has been abandoned by her husband.

original: mang pos mthun pas bcad ces bya ba ni rgyal rigs kanta shag ti'i sde rnams kyis so //
analyzed: mang pos mthun pas bcad ces bya ba ni rgyal rigs kanta shag ti'i sde rnams kyis so //
translated: “By a group of many” means by a group of kṣatriyas, brahmins, householders, or monks.

original: khyim thab gyis yongs su btang zhes bya ba ni khyos so //
analyzed: khyim thab gyis yongs su btang zhes bya ba ni khyos so //
translated: “By her husband” means by her husband.

original: rgyal pos kyang bsgo zhes bya ba ni gros mthun par byas pa'o //🔽shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis shes sam /
analyzed: rgyal pos kyang bsgo zhes bya ba ni gros mthun par byas pa'o // shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis shes sam /
translated: “By the king” means by the king.

original: gzhan gyis bsgo bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis bsgo bar gyur pa'o //
translated: “Knowingly” means if she knows it herself or if others tell her.

original: rab tu byung na zhes bya ba ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung na zhes bya ba ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la'o //
translated: “If she gives the full ordination” means if she gives the full ordination to a woman who is like that.

original: de la nyes pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de la nyes pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the offense?

original: dge slong mas ci tsam du de dang 'dra ba yin par shes bzhin du rab tu phyung na yang thams cad la 'ang dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge slong mas ci tsam du de dang 'dra ba yin par shes bzhin du rab tu phyung na yang thams cad la 'ang dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If a bhikṣuṇī gives the full ordination to a woman who is like that, even if she does not know it, she commits a saṅgha-disciple offense.

original: lhag ma bcu pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: lhag ma bcu pa rdzogs so /
translated: The tenth varga is completed.

original: // / mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug po zhig 'dug ste /
analyzed: // / mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug po zhig 'dug ste /
translated: In Śrāvastī there lived a very wealthy householder.

original: de nad kyis btab nas 'chi pa'i khar dge sbyong dang bram ze dang phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa ni byin /
analyzed: de nad kyis btab nas 'chi pa'i khar dge sbyong dang bram ze dang phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa ni byin /
translated: When he was about to die from that illness, he gave gifts to ascetics, brahmins, and the poor.

original: bsod nams ni byas so //
analyzed: bsod nams ni byas so //
translated: He made merit.

original: sbom dga' mo yang bsod snyoms la song ste khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'ongs te khyim bdag nad med cig ji lta zhing 'dug bde bar 'tsho 'am zhes smras pa dang / des kyang ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras so ;
analyzed: sbom dga' mo yang bsod snyoms la song ste khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'ongs te khyim bdag nad med cig ji lta zhing 'dug bde bar 'tsho 'am zhes smras pa dang / des kyang ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras so ;
translated: “Pramudita went for alms and came to the house of that householder. She asked, ‘Householder, are you well? How is your food? Are you living comfortably?’ He told her in detail what had happened.

original: / sbom dga' mos smras pa khyim bdag khyed kyis sbyin pa byin pa rjes su yi rang na /
analyzed: / sbom dga' mos smras pa khyim bdag khyed kyis sbyin pa byin pa rjes su yi rang na /
translated: Pramudita said, ‘Householder, if you have given gifts and rejoiced in them,

original: bud med kyi bus pa ni rnyed pa chung na /
analyzed: bud med kyi bus pa ni rnyed pa chung na /
translated: then since the son of a woman who has little wealth is poor,🔽give me a share.’

original: bdag la skal ba byin par gyis shig ces smras pa dang // nad pas smras pa /
analyzed: bdag la skal ba byin par gyis shig ces smras pa dang // nad pas smras pa /
translated: The sick man said,

original: thams cad btang lags so zhes smras pa dang / sbom dga' mos khyod kyi khyim nas ma rnyed par 'gro ba mi rigs so //
analyzed: thams cad btang lags so zhes smras pa dang / sbom dga' mos khyod kyi khyim nas ma rnyed par 'gro ba mi rigs so //
translated: ‘I have given everything away.’ Pramudita said, ‘It is not right for you to go away without getting anything from your house.’

original: khyim bdag de la bu lon gyi chags rgya tsam zhig yod de de sbom dga' mo la bstan te /
analyzed: khyim bdag de la bu lon gyi chags rgya tsam zhig yod de de sbom dga' mo la bstan te /
translated: The householder had only a promissory note. He showed it to Thullanandā.

original: 'di las ma lus te bzhed na snoms shig /
analyzed: 'di las ma lus te bzhed na snoms shig /
translated: “If you want it, take it, since it is not in full.”

original: des kyang chags rgya khyer ro //
analyzed: des kyang chags rgya khyer ro //
translated: She took the promissory note.

original: nad pas smras pa /
analyzed: nad pas smras pa /
translated: The sick man said,

original: rigs kyi bu de dbul mod kyis brdzun mi mchi bas ci phul ba long la de snyon ma rmongs shig ces smras so //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu de dbul mod kyis brdzun mi mchi bas ci phul ba long la de snyon ma rmongs shig ces smras so //
translated: “Noble lady, I am poor, but I am not a liar. Take what I have given and do not dispute it.”

original: sbom dga' mos bdag cag ni sdom pa la gnas pas de ltar ga la byed ces smras nas //
analyzed: sbom dga' mos bdag cag ni sdom pa la gnas pas de ltar ga la byed ces smras nas //
translated: Thullanandā said, “We are bound by vows. How could we do that?”

original: khyim bdag de dus 'das pa dang / sbom dga' mos rigs kyi bu de bzung nas nyon mongs dang khyim bdag dag 'phya ste /🔽ci'i @57a * //
analyzed: khyim bdag de dus 'das pa dang / sbom dga' mos rigs kyi bu de bzung nas nyon mongs dang khyim bdag dag 'phya ste / ci'i @57a * //
translated: When the householder died, Thullanandā took possession of the man’s property. The householders criticized her,

original: phyir na dge slong mas shi ba'i nor dad par byed ces mi snyan par brjod do //
analyzed: phyir na dge slong mas shi ba'i nor dad par byed ces mi snyan par brjod do //
translated: saying, “Why does a nun take possession of the property of a dead man?”

original: de ltar gyur pa ston pa la gsol nas /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa ston pa la gsol nas /
translated: They complained to the Teacher,

original: bslab pa'i gnas bcas so //
analyzed: bslab pa'i gnas bcas so //
translated: and he laid down the rule.

original: yang dge slob ma gang shi ba'i nor chags pa 'das na chos 'di yang thog ma nyid kyis ltung bar 'gyur la dbyung bar bya ba ste dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
analyzed: yang dge slob ma gang shi ba'i nor chags pa 'das na chos 'di yang thog ma nyid kyis ltung bar 'gyur la dbyung bar bya ba ste dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
translated: Also, if a female novice dies and the nun takes her possessions, this is also a downfall from the beginning, and is to be restored. It is a serious offense.

original: dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //
translated: “A nun” means a nun like Utpalavarṇā.

original: shi kha'i nor chags pa bda' zhes bya ba ni bdag gis byas pa'o //
analyzed: shi kha'i nor chags pa bda' zhes bya ba ni bdag gis byas pa'o //
translated: “Takes the possessions of one who has died” means that she takes what she herself has made.

original: de la nyes pa ji lta bu zhe na dge slong mas ji tsam du shi ba'i nor rab tu byung ba'am gnyen bshes la sogs pa gzhan gyis byin yang rung ste /
analyzed: de la nyes pa ji lta bu zhe na dge slong mas ji tsam du shi ba'i nor rab tu byung ba'am gnyen bshes la sogs pa gzhan gyis byin yang rung ste /
translated: What is the fault? A nun, whether the possessions of one who has died are given by another, such as a renunciant or a relative,

original: shi ba'i nor nyon mongs par byas te bdas na blangs ma thag tu lhag mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shi ba'i nor nyon mongs par byas te bdas na blangs ma thag tu lhag mar 'gyur ro //
translated: or whether she takes the possessions of one who has died and makes them her own, as soon as she takes them, she has a serious offense.

original: gal te dge 'dun gyi 'am nyon ma mongs pa zhig tu khugs na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyi 'am nyon ma mongs pa zhig tu khugs na nyes pa med do //
translated: If she takes them as the property of the Saṅgha or if she takes them without making them her own, there is no offense.

original: lhag ma bcu gcig pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: lhag ma bcu gcig pa rdzogs so /
translated: The eleventh downfall is completed.

original: // / mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ma rnam par 'khyam pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de //
analyzed: // / mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ma rnam par 'khyam pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de //
translated: In Śrāvastī there was a nun named Wandering.

original: kha ngan can khong khro ba man gdu smra ba zhig ste /
analyzed: kha ngan can khong khro ba man gdu smra ba zhig ste /
translated: She was a slanderer, angry, and harsh-spoken.

original: des dge slong ma thams cad mi dga' bar byas so //
analyzed: des dge slong ma thams cad mi dga' bar byas so //
translated: She made all the nuns unhappy.

original: de bsod snyoms la song ba'i 'og tu dge slong ma rnams de la ji lta bur gyur pa mi snyan par smra'o //
analyzed: de bsod snyoms la song ba'i 'og tu dge slong ma rnams de la ji lta bur gyur pa mi snyan par smra'o //
translated: After she had gone out for alms, the nuns told her what had happened.

original: rnam par 'khyam pa'i bu mo gtsug mo zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
analyzed: rnam par 'khyam pa'i bu mo gtsug mo zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
translated: There was a girl named Siṃha who was a fortune-teller.

original: des ma 'ongs pa dang thams cad bzlas te /
analyzed: des ma 'ongs pa dang thams cad bzlas te /
translated: She had memorized the future and everything.

original: de thos pa dang / dge slong ma rnams la tshig gdug pas shin tu gnod par byed do //
analyzed: de thos pa dang / dge slong ma rnams la tshig gdug pas shin tu gnod par byed do //
translated: When she heard about it, she spoke harshly to the nuns and caused them great harm.

original: dge slong ma dag gis ji ltar gtsug mos thos pa thams cad bzlas par shes na /
analyzed: dge slong ma dag gis ji ltar gtsug mos thos pa thams cad bzlas par shes na /
translated: The nuns knew how Siṃha had memorized everything.

original: de dag gis gtsug mo spang ba'i las byas so //
analyzed: de dag gis gtsug mo spang ba'i las byas so //
translated: They performed the act of banishing Siṃha.

original: de yang du bzhin du ma la bdag la dge slong ma dag gis spang ba'i las byas so zhes smras pa dang mas thos nas khros te /
analyzed: de yang du bzhin du ma la bdag la dge slong ma dag gis spang ba'i las byas so zhes smras pa dang mas thos nas khros te /
translated: She cried and said to her mother, “The nuns performed the act of banishing me.” When her mother heard this, she became angry.

original: de dag nyid yul 'di nas gzhan du spong bar shog shig ces smras te //
analyzed: de dag nyid yul 'di nas gzhan du spong bar shog shig ces smras te //
translated: “May they be banished from this country!” she said.

original: bum mo khrid nas mtshams kyi phyi rol du dbyung bar byas so //
analyzed: bum mo khrid nas mtshams kyi phyi rol du dbyung bar byas so //
translated: She took the girl and went outside the monastery.🔽The nuns said, “Your daughter has been expelled by the Sangha of nuns.”

original: dge slong ma dag gis khyod kyi bu mo ded kyis spang ba'i las byas so zhes smras pa dang de khros nas 'di ngas phyung ngo //
analyzed: dge slong ma dag gis khyod kyi bu mo ded kyis spang ba'i las byas so zhes smras pa dang de khros nas 'di ngas phyung ngo //
translated: She became angry and said, “I’ll take her out.”

original: dge slong ma dag gis gang du ji ltar phyung /
analyzed: dge slong ma dag gis gang du ji ltar phyung /
translated: The nuns asked, “Where and how will you take her out?”

original: des smras pa mtshams kyi phyi rol du'o //
analyzed: des smras pa mtshams kyi phyi rol du'o //
translated: She said, “Outside the monastery.”

original: dge slong ma dag gis mtshams kyi phyi rol du de ltar dbyung du rung ngam //
analyzed: dge slong ma dag gis mtshams kyi phyi rol du de ltar dbyung du rung ngam //
translated: The nuns asked, “Is it proper to take her out outside the monastery?”🔽She said, “Whether it’s proper or not, I’ll take her out.”

original: des smras pa rung ngam mi rung yang sla ste ngas phyung no zhes smras pa dang de ltar gyur @57b pa ston pa la gsol nas dge slong ma rnams la bslang pa'i gnas bcas so //
analyzed: des smras pa rung ngam mi rung yang sla ste ngas phyung no zhes smras pa dang de ltar gyur @57b pa ston pa la gsol nas dge slong ma rnams la bslang pa'i gnas bcas so //
translated: When the Teacher was informed of what had happened, he established a rule for the nuns:

original: yang dge slong ma dag gis dge slong ma gang la dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis spang ba'i las byas pa shes bzhin du de mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas g-yo 'dor bar byas na chos 'di yang thog mar nyid kyis ltung bar 'gyur la dbyung bar🔽bya ba ste dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma dag gis dge slong ma gang la dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis spang ba'i las byas pa shes bzhin du de mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas g-yo 'dor bar byas na chos 'di yang thog mar nyid kyis ltung bar 'gyur la dbyung bar bya ba ste dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o //
translated: “Also, if a nun, knowing that a nun has been given a demotion by the Saṅgha of nuns, goes outside the territory with her, and then makes a motion to lift the demotion, this rule too is an immediate offense entailing sending away and suspension:🔽the offense entailing suspension by the Saṅgha.

original: yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'khyam pa'o //🔽dge slong ma gang la zhes bya ba ni gtsug dga' mo'o //
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'khyam pa'o // dge slong ma gang la zhes bya ba ni gtsug dga' mo'o //
translated: ‘A nun’ means a wandering nun.🔽‘A nun’ means Upacelā.

original: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: ‘The Saṅgha of nuns’ is as above.

original: spang ba'i las zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis so //
analyzed: spang ba'i las zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis so //
translated: ‘A demotion’ means a motion and a single announcement.

analyzed: shes bzhin zhes bya ba ni bdag gis shes sam gzhan gyim smras pa'o //

analyzed: khyed so sor gnas pas dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar mi 'gyur gyi 'bri bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o zhes bya ni dge ba'i chos skye bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “You should know that if you stay separately, your wholesome states will not increase but will decrease” means that wholesome states will not arise.

original: khyed 'dus te 'khod cig ces bya ba ni gnas gcig tu 'dus shig pa'o //
analyzed: khyed 'dus te 'khod cig ces bya ba ni gnas gcig tu 'dus shig pa'o //
translated: “You should gather together” means you should gather in one place.

original: dge ba'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur gyi mi 'bri bar shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni skye bar 'gyur ba'i don no //🔽'di sked zer zhes bya @61a * //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur gyi mi 'bri bar shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni skye bar 'gyur ba'i don no // 'di sked zer zhes bya @61a * //
translated: “You should know that your wholesome states will increase and not decrease” means that they will arise.

original: ba ni smra ba'o //
analyzed: ba ni smra ba'o //
translated: “This is what was said” means this is what was spoken.

original: dge slong ma de la zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma de la zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //
translated: “To that nun” means to Thullanandā.

original: dge slong ma rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di la zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di la zhugs pa'o //
translated: The nuns means those who have entered into this Dharma.

original: 'di skad bsgo zhes bya ba ni tshig 'jam pos so //
analyzed: 'di skad bsgo zhes bya ba ni tshig 'jam pos so //
translated: They should be told means with gentle words.

original: gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: The rest is the same as above.

original: lhag ma bcu drug pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: lhag ma bcu drug pa rdzogs so /
translated: The sixteenth case is finished.

original: // / ston pa rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs so //
analyzed: // / ston pa rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs so //
translated: The Teacher was staying at Rājagṛha.

original: de'i tshe na nyan thos chen mo goo ta ma ri de ma dang / autpala'i kha dog dang skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dbyar rgyal po'i khab tu tshul du bzhugs so //
analyzed: de'i tshe na nyan thos chen mo goo ta ma ri de ma dang / autpala'i kha dog dang skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dbyar rgyal po'i khab tu tshul du bzhugs so //
translated: At that time, the great hearers Gotamī, Utpalavarṇā, Mahāprajāpatī, and so forth were staying in Rājagṛha for the rainy season.

original: de'i tshe na mu ge byung ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe na mu ge byung ste /
translated: At that time, a famine occurred.

original: bsod snyoms slong bas rnyed dka' ba ni me ngan bzhin no //
analyzed: bsod snyoms slong bas rnyed dka' ba ni me ngan bzhin no //
translated: It was as if a bad fire had arisen, making it difficult to obtain alms.

original: de'i tshe na sbom dga' mo dge slong ma rnams dang 'thab cing rtsod par gyur cing 'dug go //🔽sbom dga' mos /
analyzed: de'i tshe na sbom dga' mo dge slong ma rnams dang 'thab cing rtsod par gyur cing 'dug go // sbom dga' mos /
translated: At that time, Thullanandā was staying, arguing and disputing with the nuns.🔽Thullanandā said,

original: dga' mo dang / nye dga' mo dang / gtsug dga' mo dag la smras pa /
analyzed: dga' mo dang / nye dga' mo dang / gtsug dga' mo dag la smras pa /
translated: Nandā, Upasandā, and Cūḍānandi

original: dga' mo nye dga' mo tshur shog dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dbye'o //
analyzed: dga' mo nye dga' mo tshur shog dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dbye'o //
translated: We will divide the wheel!

original: 'khor lo yang dbye bar bya'o zhes smras pa dang / sbom dga' mo ston pa'i nyan thos ma rnams ni rdzu 'phrul che pha rol gyi sems shes pas na bdag cag g-yos pa yang shes pa yod na mi nus pa snyam /
analyzed: 'khor lo yang dbye bar bya'o zhes smras pa dang / sbom dga' mo ston pa'i nyan thos ma rnams ni rdzu 'phrul che pha rol gyi sems shes pas na bdag cag g-yos pa yang shes pa yod na mi nus pa snyam /
translated: Pramudita thought, The Shravakas of the Teacher have great magical powers and know the minds of others, so if they know our plans, we will not succeed.

original: dga' mo de la thabs yod do //
analyzed: dga' mo de la thabs yod do //
translated: Pramudita said, Sister, there is a way to do this.

original: sbom dga' mos thabs gang yin /
analyzed: sbom dga' mos thabs gang yin /
translated: Pramudita asked, What is the way?

original: dga' mo tshur shog /
analyzed: dga' mo tshur shog /
translated: Pramudita said, Sister, come here.

original: bdag gis gnas brtan dag chos gos dang zas dang yo byad dag gis bstabs par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis gnas brtan dag chos gos dang zas dang yo byad dag gis bstabs par bya /
translated: I will provide the elders with Dharma robes, food, and necessities.

original: dge slong ma rnams ni nye bar bcar la lhung bzed dang chos gos la sogs pa dang / klag pa dang / kha ton dang / yid la byed pa rnams kyis bsdu zhing dbang du dgug go //
analyzed: dge slong ma rnams ni nye bar bcar la lhung bzed dang chos gos la sogs pa dang / klag pa dang / kha ton dang / yid la byed pa rnams kyis bsdu zhing dbang du dgug go //
translated: I will gather the nuns around me and attract them with bowls, Dharma robes, and so forth, and with reading, recitation, and contemplation.

original: sbom dga' mo thabs de ni rung ngo zhes te /
analyzed: sbom dga' mo thabs de ni rung ngo zhes te /
translated: Pramudita said, That method is suitable.

original: de dag sbyor ba las dge slong ma dag gis tshor nas /
analyzed: de dag sbyor ba las dge slong ma dag gis tshor nas /
translated: The nuns noticed their preparations and said, Sisters, what are you doing?🔽 They replied, Sisters, we are preparing to divide the wheel of the Dharma.

original: der gyur pa ston pa la gsol nas tshig 'jam pos bsgo shig ces bya ba nas /
analyzed: der gyur pa ston pa la gsol nas tshig 'jam pos bsgo shig ces bya ba nas /
translated: Then, having asked the Teacher, you should order her with gentle words.

original: gsol bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba dang / 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes don de nyid la mthu bskyed de mngon du bzung ste 'dug go //
analyzed: gsol bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba dang / 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes don de nyid la mthu bskyed de mngon du bzung ste 'dug go //
translated: Then, having ordered her with a legal procedure consisting of asking four times, she remained, saying, This is the truth, the other is confused, and she took up the matter with force.

original: de'i grogs mo rjes su phyogs pa dga' mo dang bsnyen dga' mo dang gtsug dga' mo dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: de'i grogs mo rjes su phyogs pa dga' mo dang bsnyen dga' mo dang gtsug dga' mo dag gis smras pa /
translated: Her friends, Nanda, Upagupta, and Siṃhaguptā, said,

original: 'phags ma khyed kyis dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong ma 'di la cang ma zer cig /
analyzed: 'phags ma khyed kyis dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong ma 'di la cang ma zer cig /
translated: Noble lady, whether it is good or bad, do not say anything to this nun.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dge slong ma 'di ni chos smra ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di ni chos smra ba'o //
translated: This nun is a Dharma teacher.

original: dge slong ma 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba @61b bzung nas rab tu 'dzin cing spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba @61b bzung nas rab tu 'dzin cing spyod pa'o //
translated: This nun has taken up and holds the Dharma and the Vinaya and practices it.

original: dge slong ma 'di shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin no //
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin no //
translated: This nun speaks with knowledge, not without knowledge.

original: dge slong ma 'di gang la dad cing bzod pa dag kyang de la dad cing bzod do zhes bya ba dang / de ltar gyur pa ston pa la gsol nas bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di gang la dad cing bzod pa dag kyang de la dad cing bzod do zhes bya ba dang / de ltar gyur pa ston pa la gsol nas bka' stsal pa /
translated: “The Teacher was informed of this situation and said,

original: dge slong ma khyod kyis dga' mo dang bsnyen dga' mo dang gtsug dga' mo dag tshig 'jam pos bsgo shig ces bya ba nas /
analyzed: dge slong ma khyod kyis dga' mo dang bsnyen dga' mo dang gtsug dga' mo dag tshig 'jam pos bsgo shig ces bya ba nas /
translated: ‘Nuns, you should tell Nandā, Nandabalā, and Utpala­nandā with gentle words to stop.

original: bslab pa bcas so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: bslab pa bcas so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The training rule is to be recited like this:

original: yang dge slong ma gang dge 'dun la dbye ba'i phyir zhugs te /
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang dge 'dun la dbye ba'i phyir zhugs te /
translated: ‘“If any nun were to persist in dividing the Saṅgha of nuns,

original: dbye bar bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa yang dag par rab tu bzung nas rab tu 'dzin cing 'dug na /
analyzed: dbye bar bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa yang dag par rab tu bzung nas rab tu 'dzin cing 'dug na /
translated: and were to persist in holding on to a dispute that would divide the Saṅgha,

original: dge slong ma de la /
analyzed: dge slong ma de la /
translated: then the other nuns should correct her like this:

original: dge slong ma rnams kyis 'phags ma khyod dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mthun pa la dbye ba'i phyir ma 'jug cig /
analyzed: dge slong ma rnams kyis 'phags ma khyod dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mthun pa la dbye ba'i phyir ma 'jug cig /
translated: “Venerable, do not divide the harmonious Saṅgha of nuns.

original: dbye bar bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa yang dag par bzung nas rab tu 'dzin cing ma 'jug cig /
analyzed: dbye bar bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa yang dag par bzung nas rab tu 'dzin cing ma 'jug cig /
translated: Do not persist in holding on to a dispute that would divide the Saṅgha.

original: 'phags ma dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang lhan cig mthun ba dang / dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang mthun pa dang / dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang sdum pa dang / mi phyed pa dang / kun dga' ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags ma dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang lhan cig mthun ba dang / dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang mthun pa dang / dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang sdum pa dang / mi phyed pa dang / kun dga' ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang /
translated: without dispute,🔽with a single recitation,🔽like milk and water mixing as one,

original: rtse gcig pa dang / 'don pa mtshungs pa dang / chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa bzhin du ston pa'i bstan pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir bde ba la reg par gnas par gyis shig /
analyzed: rtse gcig pa dang / 'don pa mtshungs pa dang / chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa bzhin du ston pa'i bstan pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir bde ba la reg par gnas par gyis shig /
translated: and live in comfort for the sake of making the Teacher’s teachings flourish.

original: 'phags ma khyod kyis dge 'dun dbye bar bya ba'i dngos po 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgos bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'phags ma khyod kyis dge 'dun dbye bar bya ba'i dngos po 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgos bar bya ba'o //
translated: Noble lady, give up this basis of schism in the community.”

original: dge slong ma de la dge slong ma rnams kyis de skad bsgo nas gal te dngos po de gtong na ni legs /
analyzed: dge slong ma de la dge slong ma rnams kyis de skad bsgo nas gal te dngos po de gtong na ni legs /
translated: If that nun, being thus addressed by the nuns, gives up that basis, all is well.

original: gal te mi gtong na dngos po de spang bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na dngos po de spang bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
translated: But if she does not give it up, the nuns should press her to give it up three times.

original: yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
translated: “I will teach you the Dharma.”

original: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo //
analyzed: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo //
translated: If she does this a second and a third time,

original: yang dag par bstan pa las dngos po de gtong na ni legs /
analyzed: yang dag par bstan pa las dngos po de gtong na ni legs /
translated: and he gives up that course of action, all is well.

original: gal te mi gtong na chos 'di la lan gnyis lan gsum du dbyung bar bya ste dge 'dun lhag ma'o ;
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na chos 'di la lan gnyis lan gsum du dbyung bar bya ste dge 'dun lhag ma'o ;
translated: But if he does not give it up, then after the motion has been made a second and a third time, he commits an offense entailing suspension.

original: / dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //
analyzed: / dge slong ma gang zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //
translated: A nun: Sthūlanandā.

original: dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun no //
analyzed: dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun no //
translated: The Sangha: the Sangha of the Blessed One’s female disciples.

original: mthun zhes bya ba ni yid gcig pa'o //
analyzed: mthun zhes bya ba ni yid gcig pa'o //
translated: In harmony: with a single intention.

original: dbye zhes bya ba ni gnyis su 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: dbye zhes bya ba ni gnyis su 'byed pa'o //
translated: To cause a split: to cause a division.

original: zhugs zhes bya ba ni phyir brtun pa'o //
analyzed: zhugs zhes bya ba ni phyir brtun pa'o //
translated: To persist: to continue.

original: dbye bar bya ba'i phyir @62a * //🔽zhes bya ba ni dbye bar bya ba'i dngos po bcu bzhi las gang yang rung ste /
analyzed: dbye bar bya ba'i phyir @62a * // zhes bya ba ni dbye bar bya ba'i dngos po bcu bzhi las gang yang rung ste /
translated: In order to cause a split:🔽in order to cause a schism.

original: legs par shin tu bzung ba'o //
analyzed: legs par shin tu bzung ba'o //
translated: To hold firmly to: to hold well and firmly.

original: rtsod pa zhes bya ba ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: rtsod pa zhes bya ba ni bzhi ste /
translated: There are four kinds of disputes:

original: 'khrug pas rtsod pa dang / mi ston pas rtsod pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsod pa dang / bya ba'i rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: 'khrug pas rtsod pa dang / mi ston pas rtsod pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsod pa dang / bya ba'i rtsod pa'o //
translated: Disputes about quarrels, disputes about not teaching, disputes about downfalls, and disputes about actions.

original: 'di skad bsgo shig ces bya ba ni tshig 'jam pos so //
analyzed: 'di skad bsgo shig ces bya ba ni tshig 'jam pos so //
translated: As it is said, Speak like this means with gentle words.

original: gzhan ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as explained before.

original: lhag ma bcu bdun pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: lhag ma bcu bdun pa rdzogs so /
translated: The seventeenth chapter is finished.

original: // / de nas ston pa gdan de la bzhugs bzhin du nyan thos ma rnams la bslab pa'i gnas bca' bar dgongs nas dge slong ma dag la gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / de nas ston pa gdan de la bzhugs bzhin du nyan thos ma rnams la bslab pa'i gnas bca' bar dgongs nas dge slong ma dag la gsungs pa /
translated: Then, while the Teacher was sitting on that seat, he thought of establishing the precepts for the nuns, and spoke to the nuns:

original: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la bya ba cung zad cig yod kyis ma ldang zhig /
analyzed: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la bya ba cung zad cig yod kyis ma ldang zhig /
translated: There is a small matter to be done for the community of nuns, so do not rise.

original: dge slong ma de la grogs dge slong ma'i rjes su phyogs pa /
analyzed: dge slong ma de la grogs dge slong ma'i rjes su phyogs pa /
translated: To that nun, there is a companion nun who sides with her,

original: dbyen du smra ba gcig gam /
analyzed: dbyen du smra ba gcig gam /
translated: one who speaks of schism,

original: gnyis sam mang po 'ang rung ste /
analyzed: gnyis sam mang po 'ang rung ste /
translated: whether one or two or many.

original: gal te de dag dge slong ma rnams la dge slong ma khyed la dge slong ma la dge yang rung sdig kyang rung cung zad kyang ma zer cig /
analyzed: gal te de dag dge slong ma rnams la dge slong ma khyed la dge slong ma la dge yang rung sdig kyang rung cung zad kyang ma zer cig /
translated: If they say to the nuns, Nuns, do not say anything, whether good or bad, about the nuns at all.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dge slong ma 'di ni chos smra ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di ni chos smra ba'o //
translated: This bhikṣuṇī is a Dharma teacher.

original: 'dul ba smra ba'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba smra ba'o //
translated: She is a Vinaya teacher.

original: dge slong ma 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par bzung nas rab tu 'dzin cing spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par bzung nas rab tu 'dzin cing spyod pa'o //
translated: This bhikṣuṇī has taken up and upholds the Dharma and Vinaya and practices it.

original: dge slong ma 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin te /
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin te /
translated: This bhikṣuṇī speaks with knowledge, not without knowledge.🔽If this bhikṣuṇī is patient and forbearing, we are also patient and forbearing.’🔽If bhikṣuṇīs speak in this way to that bhikṣuṇī, the bhikṣuṇīs should correct those bhikṣuṇīs, saying, ‘Noble ones, do not say that this bhikṣuṇī is a Dharma teacher.🔽Do not say that she is a Vinaya teacher.

original: dge slong ma 'di gang la dad cing bzod pa bdag cag kyang de la bzod do zhes de skad zer na dge slong ma de la dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong ma khyod dge slong ma gang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mthun pa la dbye bar zhugs
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di gang la dad cing bzod pa bdag cag kyang de la bzod do zhes de skad zer na dge slong ma de la dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong ma khyod dge slong ma gang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mthun pa la dbye bar zhugs
translated: Do not say that she has taken up and upholds the Dharma and Vinaya and practices it.🔽Do not say that she speaks with knowledge, not without knowledge.🔽Do not say that if this bhikṣuṇī is patient and forbearing, you are also patient and forbearing.🔽Noble ones, this bhikṣuṇī is not a Dharma teacher.🔽She is not a Vinaya teacher.🔽She has not taken up and upholds the Dharma and Vinaya and practices it.🔽She speaks without knowledge, not with knowledge.🔽If this bhikṣuṇī is not patient and forbearing, you are not patient and forbearing.🔽Noble ones, this bhikṣuṇī is divisive.

original: te / dbye bar bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa yang dag par bzung nas rab tu 'dzin cing 'dug par shes bzhin du de'i grogs su 'gyur te /
analyzed: te / dbye bar bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa yang dag par bzung nas rab tu 'dzin cing 'dug par shes bzhin du de'i grogs su 'gyur te /
translated: She has engaged in dividing the saṅgha of bhikṣus that is in harmony, and she has taken up and upholds a dispute and is practicing it.🔽She is a friend of those who side with her in the schism.

original: rjes su phyogs nas dbyen du smra bar byed de /
analyzed: rjes su phyogs nas dbyen du smra bar byed de /
translated: She speaks in favor of the schism.

original: dge slong ma rnams la dge slong ma 'di ni chos smra'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma rnams la dge slong ma 'di ni chos smra'o //
translated: Do not say that this bhikṣuṇī is a Dharma teacher.

original: 'dul ba smra'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba smra'o //
translated: “She is a Vinaya master.”

original: dge slong ma 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par bzung nas rab tu 'dzin cing spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par bzung nas rab tu 'dzin cing spyod pa'o //
translated: “This bhikṣuṇī has taken up the Dharma and Vinaya and upholds it and practices it.”

original: dge slong ma 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin te /
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin te /
translated: “This bhikṣuṇī speaks with knowledge, not without knowledge.

original: dge slong ma 'di gang la dad cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang dad cing bzod do zhes de skad ma sma shig //
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di gang la dad cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang dad cing bzod do zhes de skad ma sma shig //
translated: ‘We have faith in and agree with what this bhikṣuṇī has faith in and agrees with.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dge slong ma 'di ni chos ma yin par smra'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di ni chos ma yin par smra'o //
translated: “This bhikṣuṇī speaks non-Dharma.

original: dge slong ma 'di ni chos ma yin pa 'dul ba ma yin pa yang dag par bzung nas rab tu 'dzin cing spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di ni chos ma yin pa 'dul ba ma yin pa yang dag par bzung nas rab tu 'dzin cing spyod pa'o //
translated: This bhikṣuṇī has taken up what is not the Dharma and Vinaya and upholds it and practices it.”

original: dge slong ma @62b 'di ni mi shes bzhin du smra'i shes par ma yin gyis /
analyzed: dge slong ma @62b 'di ni mi shes bzhin du smra'i shes par ma yin gyis /
translated: “This bhikṣuṇī speaks without knowledge, not with knowledge.

original: dge slong ma 'di gang la dad cing bzod pa de la khyed dad cing bzod par ma byed par khyed dge 'dun dang mthun pa dang / 'dum pa dang / mi phyed pa dang / mi rtsod pa dang / rtse gcig pa dang / 'don pa mtshungs pa dang /
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di gang la dad cing bzod pa de la khyed dad cing bzod par ma byed par khyed dge 'dun dang mthun pa dang / 'dum pa dang / mi phyed pa dang / mi rtsod pa dang / rtse gcig pa dang / 'don pa mtshungs pa dang /
translated: You should not have faith in and agree with what this nun has faith in and agrees with.🔽You should live comfortably, in harmony with the Saṅgha,🔽in unity, without dispute, as one in heart,🔽as one in speech,🔽like milk and water,

original: chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa bzhin ston pa'i bstan pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir bde ba la reg par gnas par gyis shig /🔽dge slong ma khyed dge 'dun dbye ba 'di 'dra ba rjes su phyogs nas dbyen du smra ba thong shig ces de skad bsgo shig /
analyzed: chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa bzhin ston pa'i bstan pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir bde ba la reg par gnas par gyis shig / dge slong ma khyed dge 'dun dbye ba 'di 'dra ba rjes su phyogs nas dbyen du smra ba thong shig ces de skad bsgo shig /
translated: in order to live peacefully and to nurture the teachings of the Teacher.🔽The nuns should say to those nuns, ‘Sisters, do not side with this schism in the Saṅgha.

original: dge slong ma de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis de skad bsgo nas /
analyzed: dge slong ma de dag la dge slong ma rnams kyis de skad bsgo nas /
translated: Give up speaking divisively.’

original: gal te dngos po de gtong na ni legs /
analyzed: gal te dngos po de gtong na ni legs /
translated: If those nuns give up that , it is good.

original: gal te mi gtong na dngos po de spong bar byed pa'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na dngos po de spong bar byed pa'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
translated: But if they do not give it up, they should be pressed up to three times.

original: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo //🔽yang dag par bstan pa las /
analyzed: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo // yang dag par bstan pa las /
translated: She should be admonished up to the third time.

original: gal te dngos po de gtong na ni legs /
analyzed: gal te dngos po de gtong na ni legs /
translated: If, after being admonished by the community of nuns, she gives up that thing, that is good.

original: gal te mi gtong na chos 'di yang lan gsum pa dbyung bar bya ste /🔽dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na chos 'di yang lan gsum pa dbyung bar bya ste / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o //
translated: If she does not give it up, then this matter should be taken up a third time.🔽It is a serious offense for the community of monks.

original: dge slong ma de'i zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //🔽grogs dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni dga' mo dang / bsnyen dga' mo dang gtsug dga' mo'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma de'i zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o // grogs dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni dga' mo dang / bsnyen dga' mo dang gtsug dga' mo'o //
translated: “That nun” means Thullanandā.🔽“A nun friend” means Nandā, Upasampadā, and Siṅgā.

original: rjes su phyogs zhes bya ba ni gcig tu dad cing gcig tu sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su phyogs zhes bya ba ni gcig tu dad cing gcig tu sbyor ba'o //
translated: “To side with her” means to have complete faith in her and to completely agree with her.

original: dbyen du smra zhes bya ba ni dbye bar smra ba'o //
analyzed: dbyen du smra zhes bya ba ni dbye bar smra ba'o //
translated: “To speak of schism” means to speak of a schism.

original: gcig gam gnyis sam mang po zhes bya ba ni gnyis yan chad mang po'o //
analyzed: gcig gam gnyis sam mang po zhes bya ba ni gnyis yan chad mang po'o //
translated: “One, two, or many” means two or more.

original: dge slong ma dag ces bya ba ni chos 'di la zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma dag ces bya ba ni chos 'di la zhugs pa'o //
translated: “Nuns” means those who have entered into this Dharma.

original: de skad ces bya ba ni smra ba'o //
analyzed: de skad ces bya ba ni smra ba'o //
translated: “To say this” means to speak this.

original: dge slong ma khyed kyis dge slong ma 'di la cang ma zer cig ces bya ba ni sbom dga' mo la'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma khyed kyis dge slong ma 'di la cang ma zer cig ces bya ba ni sbom dga' mo la'o //
translated: You should not say anything about this nun, to Bhadramudrāhasta.

original: dge 'am sdig pa yang rung zhes bya ba ni dge ba la 'jug par mi bya zhing /
analyzed: dge 'am sdig pa yang rung zhes bya ba ni dge ba la 'jug par mi bya zhing /
translated: Whether it is virtuous or nonvirtuous means Do not engage in virtue.

original: sdig pa las bzlog mi dgos zhes zer ba'o //
analyzed: sdig pa las bzlog mi dgos zhes zer ba'o //
translated: Do not turn away from nonvirtue.

original: dge slong ma 'di ni chos smra ba 'dul ba smra ba'o zhes bya ba ni chos dang 'dul ba dang ston pa'i bstan pa bzhin du smra ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di ni chos smra ba 'dul ba smra ba'o zhes bya ba ni chos dang 'dul ba dang ston pa'i bstan pa bzhin du smra ba'o //
translated: This nun is a Dharma teacher, a Vinaya teacher, means She speaks in accordance with the Dharma, the Vinaya, and the Teacher's teachings.

original: dge slong ma 'di zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma 'di zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'o //
translated: This nun means Bhadramudrāhasta.

original: gang la dad cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang dad cing bzod do zhes bya ba ni dngos su zad do //
analyzed: gang la dad cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang dad cing bzod do zhes bya ba ni dngos su zad do //
translated: We also have faith in and accept what she has faith in and accepts, means We accept it directly.

original: gzhan ni gong du bshad zin pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni gong du bshad zin pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: The rest is similar to what was explained above.

original: lhag ma bco brgyad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: lhag ma bco brgyad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The eighteenth case is complete.

original: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs so //
analyzed: // / ston pa mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs so //
translated: The Teacher was dwelling in Śrāvastī.

original: de'i tshe na @63a * //
analyzed: de'i tshe na @63a * //
translated: At that time,

analyzed: srin bu'i ri zhes bya ba na dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde /
translated: on a mountain called Kṛmi, there was a group of twelve nuns.

original: dga' mo dang / bsnyen dga' mo dang / sbom dga' mo la sogs pa 'khor de dag kyang khyim sun 'byin pa'i chos kun tu sbyor te /
analyzed: dga' mo dang / bsnyen dga' mo dang / sbom dga' mo la sogs pa 'khor de dag kyang khyim sun 'byin pa'i chos kun tu sbyor te /
translated: They were also involved in the activities of the nuns who were corrupting the householders.

original: skyes pa dang steg / gang rgyangs byed /🔽stan gcig la 'dug / snod gcig gi nang du za /
analyzed: skyes pa dang steg / gang rgyangs byed / stan gcig la 'dug / snod gcig gi nang du za /

analyzed: phor bu gcig gi nang na chang sna mang po 'thung /
translated: They would sit on the same seat, eat from the same plate, and drink from the same cup.

original: gar byed glu len /
analyzed: gar byed glu len /
translated: They would dance, sing, and play musical instruments.

original: len du 'jug rol mo mkhas pa rnams la bya dga' sbyin /
analyzed: len du 'jug rol mo mkhas pa rnams la bya dga' sbyin /
translated: They would give gifts to those who were skilled in music.

original: gos brtse / brang rgyug / glang po che la sogs pa ste byol song sna tshogs kyi skad 'byin /🔽de dag 'thab pa ltar yang byed /
analyzed: gos brtse / brang rgyug / glang po che la sogs pa ste byol song sna tshogs kyi skad 'byin / de dag 'thab pa ltar yang byed /
translated: They would wear clothes, run around, and make the sounds of various animals, such as elephants.

original: byed du 'jug ste /
analyzed: byed du 'jug ste /
translated: They would fight and make others fight.🔽They would do and make others do things that were not the work of ascetics.

original: dge sbyong gi las ma yin pa 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang byed cing byed du 'jug pas srin bu'i ri der dge slong ma ma 'ongs pa rnams ni mi 'ong /
analyzed: dge sbyong gi las ma yin pa 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang byed cing byed du 'jug pas srin bu'i ri der dge slong ma ma 'ongs pa rnams ni mi 'ong /

analyzed: 'ongs pa rnams kyi dge slong ma sdig can gyi gnas so zhes spong ngo //
translated: and those who had come would say, “This is the abode of sinful nuns,” and leave.

analyzed: de nas dge slong ma mang zhig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las srin bu'i rir phyin te /

analyzed: de dag snga dro srin bu'i rir bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de dag ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa bzhin du slar byung ste /

analyzed: bsod snyoms cung zad kyang ma rnyed nas de dag gis bsams pa /
translated: They did not get even a little alms. They thought,

analyzed: srin bu'i ri 'dir sngon 'byor ba rgyas pa skye bo mang pos gang ste bsod snyoms kyang rnyed na da ni bdag cag lhung bzed stong par slar log la ston pa'i nyan thos byis pa lta bu mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa dag gis rigs kyi skyes pa
translated: “In this Kṛmigaṇḍakī, before it was prosperous, full of many people, and alms were obtained. Now we return with empty alms bowls. The foolish disciples of the Teacher, who are not clear, not wise,

analyzed: dang bus pa dag la kha ngan mang du smras grang snyam mo //
translated: have said many bad things to the men of the family and the boys.”

original: de'i tshe na srin bu'i ri'i bram ze dang khyim bdag mang po dag gnas bzang po zhig na don zhig gi phyir 'dus shing 'khod do //
analyzed: de'i tshe na srin bu'i ri'i bram ze dang khyim bdag mang po dag gnas bzang po zhig na don zhig gi phyir 'dus shing 'khod do //
translated: At that time, many brahmins and householders of Kṛmigaṇḍakī were gathered together in a good place for the sake of a matter.

translated: At that time, a lay brother named “One Who Dives in Water” saw that many nuns had not received any alms. He asked them, “What is the matter?”🔽“Noble ones, out of love for us, go to Śrāvastī and tell the Teacher what happened.”

original: 'phags ma dag bdag la rjes su brtse ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par bzhud la ji ltar gyur pa ston pa la gsol cig ces bya ba dang / dge slong ma dag gis kyang de bzhin du khas blangs so //
analyzed: 'phags ma dag bdag la rjes su brtse ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par bzhud la ji ltar gyur pa ston pa la gsol cig ces bya ba dang / dge slong ma dag gis kyang de bzhin du khas blangs so //

analyzed: de nas dge slongs ma rnams dge bsnyen des bza' ba dang / bca' bas tshim par byas nas stan las langs te dong ngo //
translated: Then the lay brother satisfied the nuns with food and drink, and they rose from their seats and left.🔽When they arrived in Śrāvastī, they told the nuns what had happened, and, as before, they asked the Teacher.

original: de nas mnyan du yod par phyin pa dang / ji ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag la smras pa @63b dang ; snga ma bzhin du ston pa la gsol pa dang / bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: de nas mnyan du yod par phyin pa dang / ji ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag la smras pa @63b dang ; snga ma bzhin du ston pa la gsol pa dang / bka' stsal ba /
translated: The Teacher said,

analyzed: skye dgu'i bdag mo dge slong ma lnga brgya dang song la de dag bsgrad pa'i las gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas /

analyzed: de dag kyang ston pas gsungs pa bzhin du lam gyi bar du 'khod cing gleng ba po chos lnga dang ldan pa bskos te /

analyzed: 'khor lnga brgya dang srin bu'i rir phyin pa dang / bcu gnyis sdes skye dgu'i bdag mo la sogs pa bdag cag la bskrad pa'i las byed du'ang zhes thos nas bzang mo dang / mdzes ma dang / rgyal mtha' dag gis bsams pa skye dgu'i bdag mos de dag la bskrad pa'i las byas na bdag cag la'ang byed du 'ong ngo snyam nas nub phyogs kyi sgor byung ste /
translated: The twelve heard that Mahaprajapati and the others were performing the act of suspension against them. Bhadra, Sundari, and all the queens thought, “If Mahaprajapati performs the act of suspension against them, she will also perform it against us.” They went out the western gate.

original: mnyan du yod par phyin pa dang / de dag gis bshags pa dang bsdam par bya ba rnams byas nas dge slong ma rang bzhin du gnas pa dang lhan gcig tu gnas so //
analyzed: mnyan du yod par phyin pa dang / de dag gis bshags pa dang bsdam par bya ba rnams byas nas dge slong ma rang bzhin du gnas pa dang lhan gcig tu gnas so //
translated: They went to Śrāvastī and confessed and were restrained. They then lived together with the nun Svabhāvatṛṣṇā.

original: de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas pas de dag bskrad pa'i las byas nas de dag slar log ste /
analyzed: de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas pas de dag bskrad pa'i las byas nas de dag slar log ste /
translated: Then Mahāprajāpatī with her retinue performed the act of banishing them. They returned
